flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: In this project we are going to walk thought the design and development of the lights and the hurdles that we encountered so that you may build your own lights
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this project we are going to walk thought the design and development of the lights and the hurdles that we encountered so that you may build your own lights

Tools
  • Lathe
guide.summary: Over the past 12 years i have been involved in underwater robotics and when using ROV systems one of the things you are always lacking is light, so after many attempts we developed a very low cost but robust light using the lastest LED technology.
guide.title: Underwater Lighting Systems
